title: The Goat on a Boat: If You Are Shy, Give it a Try
description: The Goat on the Boat is feeling very shy. Most of the time it’s a quick hi and bye-bye.Being on the boat brings a big smile. But it does get lonely every once in a while.I hope to meet a friend sometime soon, you see. Even if it’s an eagle, an elephant, or a monkey.The Goat on the Boat is a social story that portrays a young goat that struggles with shyness, anxiety and new experiences.  Sail away with The Goat on a Boat and see what happens next.
author: Mary Lee Kendal
